name: Conwy - Atlassian
description: Dark, low-contrast, brightness inversion theme for Atlassian cloud tools. Only tested on Jira.
additional_info:
• 2020-03-06: 1.1.8: invert entire hight of the content, not just the viewport (class change)
  • 2020-02-10: 1.1.7: do not invert highlighted avatars
  • 2020-01-31: 1.1.6: invert entire hight of the content, not just the viewport (fix)
  • 2020-01-23: 1.1.5: invert entire hight of the content, not just the viewport
  • 2019-12-06: 1.1.4: do not invert emojis
  • 1.1.3: do not invert avatar on card popup (more comprehensive)
  • 1.1.2: do not invert avatar on card popup (class changes)
  • 1.1.1: do not invert avatar on card popup
  • 1.1.0: darken background on ticket popup
